name: Samurai Clans Clash – Defend The Tower In This Awesome Strategy Shooting Game FREE
name_original: Samurai Clans Clash – Defend The Tower In This Awesome Strategy Shooting Game FREE
description:
****** Free Clan Defense Game! ******

***** Intense bomb-blasting action *****

Do you want to become a hero?

Then you can start here! With your wits and strategic planning you can defend your clan!

This game is a fast-paced, combat strategy game. Defend your clan against hordes of enemies and bad guys. Explore a mystical world as you battle through different environment, capture loot and steal rare items. Build your fortress stronghold and place them strategically on your enemies’ path. Wage war with your foes and fight to dominate your realm.

Feel the thrill of war like never before in this action-packed, heart-thumping defense game.

Features:

* Multiple levels of excitement
* Awesome animations
* Optimized performance
* Smooth and polished gameplay
* Exciting music tracks

Lead your army and defend the clan!

Download FREE Today!
